snippet.title: Sanevol Incident 44 Game Teaser  - VHS Urbex Found Footage "Incident" Series - Tape 2
snippet.description:
Sanevol Incident 44 is now released for 2.99$ at https://azagamestudio.itch.io/sanevol-incident-44

A urban explorer enters the Sanevol tuberculosis sanitorium to film and document the area, the facility was used in the past to house tuberculosis patients back in 1944, remnants of trauma and death still linger in the air, as many torturous events & incidents at the building went unseen. ( 6 possible endings ) 

All footage in this teaser trailer is a work in progress.

Sanevol Incident 44 is part of my  "Incident" Tape series, this being the second installment. 

The full urbex vhs found footage collection will feature 4 unique tapes.

When all games are released, i will include a bundle package where you can get the full urbex vhs found footage incident series at a reduced price!

VHS Urbex Found Footage "Incident" Tape Series - 4 titles:

    Grainwind Incident 77 - Free https://azagamestudio.itch.io/grainwind-incident-77
    Sanevol Incident 44 - Paid - Out now! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/grainwind-incident-77
    Lakelight Elementary Incident 68 - Paid - Out now! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/lakelight-elementary-incident-68
    Nihil Ignis Incident 48 - Paid - Out now! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/nihil-ignis-incident-48

Each tape features unique places and different "incidents". Each can be played individually and are not connected.

This is a experimental horror title, featuring non-linear exploration with no hand-holding asking you to explore everywhere as the aim of the game was to produce a realistic urbex feeling. The game changes the longer you play & evolves accordinly, what ending you get is determined by your own actions later on. 

Created by Aza Game Studio.
